content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **oats** - by tin can knits ============ -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **the oats cowl pattern is now available in the free tin can knits app ** click here to download the app or to learn more 1 only see the size instructions you need tick through the pattern and make notes support is just a tap away adjust the settings to suit you *learn to knit with alexa and emily the oats cowl is the third project in the simple collection 2 - a learn to knit series with excellent free patterns and clear tutorials from your first scarf to mittens socks and sweaters learn everything you need to know to make modern seamless knits for all of your loved ones * **want to keep up with tin can knits ** sign up for our email updates 3 and we will let you know about our new designs 4 and great in-depth tutorials 5 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **pattern info** ============ **sizing ** child **adult short adult long** finished measurements 6 **10 10** tall by 19 **23 48** around **yarn** worsted/aran weight yarn 100 **180 360** yards dk weight yarn 120 **200 420** yards sock/sport weight yarn 140 **280 580** yards * samples shown in tanis fiber arts green label aran 6 in frost and gold * **needles** worsted/aran weight yarn us #6 / 4mm us #8 / 5mm dk weight yarn us #4 / 3 5mm us #6 / 4mm sock/sport weight yarn us #2 / 2 75mm us #4 / 3 5mm * or as required to meet gauge * for child and adult short 16 circulars in each size for adult long 48 circular in each size **gauge** worsted/aran weight yarn 18 sts & 24 rounds dk weight yarn 22 sts & 30 rounds sock/sport weight yarn 26 sts & 38 rounds all gauge given in stockinette on larger needles **notions** stitch markers darning needle **helpful tutorials** casting onto circular needles 7 magic loop 8 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 9 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- 1 https //tincanknits com/app 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/the-simple-collection 3 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 4 http //tincanknits com/ 5 http //tincanknits com/techniques html 6 http //www tanisfiberarts com/yarn html 7 http //blog tincanknits com/2013/08/17/casting-on-to-circulars/ 8 http //blog tincanknits com/2013/10/03/magic-loop/ 9 http //www tincanknits com
